verses.name: Jeremiah 6:27
verses.text: I have set thee for a tower and a fortress among my people, that thou mayest know and try their way.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:28
verses.text: They are all grievous revolters, walking with slanders: they are brass and iron; they are all corrupters.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:29
verses.text: The bellows are burned, the lead is consumed of the fire; the founder melteth in vain: for the wicked are not plucked away.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:30
verses.text: Reprobate silver shall men call them, because the Lord hath rejected them.
